content:
Also, rumbling protests in the Czech Republic and the woes of Crimea’s winemakers

FOR THE first time since Israel ’s founding, efforts to form a government have failed. What will the resulting snap election mean for the prime minister, Binyamin Netanyahu? Alleged meddling in the Czech judiciary has sparked protests, as challenges to the rule of law proliferate in eastern Europe. And we visit winemakers in  Crimea , who are struggling after the territory was annexed by Russia. Runtime: 21 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: vt. 宣称，断言；提出…作为理由

wp.allege e: 在无真凭实据的情况下宣称;断言;宣称;断言声称

eg2: The court papers Allege she may be a voyeur.
法庭文件宣称她可能是一个偷窥狂。
Police officers are now routinely arresting people in order to add their DNA sample to the national police database, an inquiry will Allege tomorrow.
明天将有一份调查宣称：警察官们如今例行抓人是为了采集他们的DNA样本放入国家警用数据库。
The lawsuits  that "certain of Toyota's cars and trucks have a defect that causes sudden uncontrolled acceleration to speeds of up to 100 mph or more, " the Los Angeles Times reported Monday.
《洛杉矶时报》星期一的报道称，该诉讼宣称“某些丰田小汽车和卡车有一种缺陷，能导致汽车突然失控，速度意外加快，高达每小时100英里或更快。

ex: n. 克里米亚(半岛)；克里木(半岛)
网络 克里米亚半岛；克里米亚地区；酿造厂位于克里米尔
n. 【国】捷克；位于欧洲中部；捷克人[语]
adj. 捷克人[语]的
网络 捷克语；捷克共和国；捷克文
n. 执行时间，运行时间

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
n. 附属建筑物；附加建筑物；附录
网络 附件；附加物；附属物
eg2: Our rooms were in the annexe.
我们的房间在附属建筑物里。

ex: n. 司法部；（统称）审判人员；司法系统
adj. 法院的；司法的
网络 司法机构；司法机关；法官
eg2: an independent judiciary
独立的司法系统

ex: vi. 管闲事，干预他人之事
eg2: I no longer had to  with her.
我与她不再有什么瓜葛了。
You know, like I said, I don't want to .
你知道的，就像我之前说的，我不想插手这件事。
But the program requires the support of pork producers.And they "have to date been reluctant to support what many see as a bid by government to  in their affairs," Branswell says.
但是这个项目需要猪肉厂商的支持，而就像作者所说，“现在，他们需要不情愿的支持一个让政府插手他们事务的项目。”

ex: vi. 增殖；扩散；激增
vt. 使激增
eg2: Despite the difficulties, investors assume such deals will continue to .
尽管困难重重，投资者认为这种交易仍将继续激增。
“This resolution will give us new tools to impair North Korea’s ability to  and threaten international stability,” DiCarlo said.
迪卡洛说："这项决议将给我们提供新的手段，削弱北韩扩散和威胁国际稳定的能力。"
This discovery could help scientists devise a treatment strategy based on improving ways to rescue the nerve and stem cells from death and help them .
该发现可能帮助科学家设计出一个基于改进挽救神经细胞和干细胞并帮助它们增殖的方法的治疗策略。

ex: n. 隆隆声；持续而低沉的声音；打群架
v. 发出持续而低沉的声音；发出隆隆声；轰鸣着缓慢行进；发现…的真相
网络 轰隆隆；低沉地说；雷响
eg2: The machine rumbled as it started up.
机器轰鸣着发动起来。
thunder rumbling in the distance
远处隆隆的雷声
I'm so hungry my stomach's rumbling .
我饿得肚子咕咕叫了。
tanks rumbling through the streets
隆隆地驶过街道的坦克
They knew they had been rumbled.
他们知道自己已经被识破了。
the rumble of thunder
隆隆的雷声
Inside, the noise of the traffic was reduced to a distant rumble.
进到屋里，车辆的声音减弱了，就像是远处的隆隆声。
Although an agreement has been reached, rumbles of resentment can still be heard.
尽管已有共识，但怨愤不满之声仍时有所闻。

ex: n. 火花；电火花；火星；活力
v. 引发；触发；冒火花；飞火星
网络 斯巴达克；斯帕克；斯巴克
eg2: A shower of sparks flew up the chimney.
烟囱里飞出无数火星。
sparks from a faulty light switch
漏电的电灯开关发出的火花
A spark ignites the fuel in a car engine.
汽车发动机中的燃料由火花点燃。
a spark of hope
一线希望
As a writer he seemed to lack creative spark.
作为作家，他似乎缺少创作激情。
the sparks of revolution
革命的导火线
Sparks flew at the meeting(= there was a lot of argument) .
会上争论激烈，火星四溅。
The proposal would spark a storm of protest around the country.
这一提案将引发全国性的抗议浪潮。
Winds brought down power lines, sparking a fire.
大风刮断电线，引起了火灾。
The riots were sparked off by the arrest of a local leader.
骚乱是因逮捕一名当地领导人而触发的。
a sparking, crackling fire
噼啪直响、火星飞迸的火
The game suddenly sparked to life.
比赛突然变得激烈起来。

ex: n. 领土；领地；地盘；版图
网络 领域；地域；地区
eg2: enemy/disputed/foreign territory
敌方╱有争议的╱外国领土
occupied territories
被占领的土地
They have refused to allow UN troops to be stationed in their territory.
他们拒不允许联合国部队驻扎在他们的国土上。
Mating blackbirds will defend their territory against intruders.
乌鸫交配时会保护自己的地盘，不允许外来者侵入。
This type of work is uncharted territory for us.
我们从未涉足过这类工作。
Legal problems are Andy's territory(= he deals with them) .
法律问题由安迪负责处理。
Our representatives cover a very large territory.
我们的代理人负责的地区很广。
unexplored territory
未勘察地区
Guam and American Samoa are US territories.
关岛和美属萨摩亚是美国的准州。

ex: adj. 人迹罕至的；无人涉足的；陌生的；地图上未绘出（或未标明）的
网络 神秘海域；未知的；地图上没标明的
eg2: They set off into the country's uncharted interior.
他们出发前往这个国家人迹罕至的内陆。
The party is sailing in uncharted waters(= a situation it has not been in before) .
这个党面临一种崭新的局势。
I was moving into uncharted territory(= a completely new experience) with this relationship.
这个关系让我开始有全新的体验。
The ship hit an uncharted rock.
船撞在海图上未标示的岩石上。

Title: “We’re in uncharted territory now”—Israel’s political crisis
